page.title: 05LIFE AT GOYTRE SCHOOL
page.content: We start school at 9.00 a.m. and finish at 3.30 p.m.Our lunch break is 12.15 p.m. to 1.15 p.m.Our class is class 5 and there are 33 pupils aged 9 years to 11 years.We have a great deal of quite hard work especially in maths and English.Once a week we have P.E., games and swimming.Occasionally we have football,netball and cricket matches against neighbouring schools. Recently we have been doing a project on {Science}called,{" Science {Around Us".}We did a lot of practical work on electricity,water and heat and how they affect our lives. At Christmas time we hold our annual concert which includes drama and singing and our parents come to watch us perform. At the end of the day half of the pupils travel home by mini-bus. {BY PAUL,DONNA,NIA AND NEIL.
